segments.text: I would like to buy one round trip plane ticket to Hong Kong , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Leaving on September 5th and returning to New York City on October 9th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you prefer an aisle or a window seat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I prefer to sit next to a window .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have booked you for one window seat on American airline flight No . 409 . Have a good trip !
segments.speaker: S2
